---
title: "Women in Work Force"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r} 
#Importing Data Set
ss14pusa = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)  # read csv file
ss14pusb = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)

```

```{r}
attach(ss14pusa)
names(ss14pusa)
ss14pusa_edit = data.frame(SEX,OCCP,WKHP,MAR,WAGP,SCHL,ESP, RAC1P, REGION)
detach(ss14pusa)

attach(ss14pusb)
ss14pusb_edit = data.frame(SEX,OCCP,WKHP,MAR,WAGP,SCHL,ESP, RAC1P, REGION)
detach(ss14pusb)

Data = rbind(ss14pusa_edit,ss14pusb_edit)
colnames(Data) <- c("Gender","Occupation", "Work_hours", "Marriage", "Income", "Education" "Parental_Occupation", "Race", "Region")

write.csv(Data, file = "Data.csv",row.names=TRUE)
```
